models.title: Your tailor-made adventure
models.description:
Discover a new way of travelling where comfort meets simplicity.
Our mini-caravans give you everything you need for unforgettable experiences.

1.title: Quality
1.description: Our teardrops are built to offer exceptional durability and comfort. Each unit is crafted from high-quality materials, ensuring maximum longevity even in demanding conditions.

2.title: Made in France
2.description: Proud of our artisanal manufacturing, we make it a point of honour to design and build our teardrops in France. By choosing our Made in France products, you support local production while enjoying durable products.

story.title: Welcome to my workshop!
story.text1: In the south of France, I've been designing and building unique mini-caravans for more than two years. My craft approach is close to my heart: from the first sketch to the final adjustments, every detail is handmade and continuously refined to deliver a 100% home-built mini-caravan.
story.text2: If you'd like to discuss a project or see the manufacturing process up close, I'll be delighted to welcome you!

story.title: All you need, right behind your car.
story.description:
Discover the Teardrop: a compact and lightweight caravan designed for easy travel and real comfort.

Its elegant design, low maintenance, and zero mechanical worries make every trip simple and enjoyable.
Wherever life takes you, your cozy little nest is ready to go — whenever you are.

5.title: Comfort and independence

story.title: A New Way to Travel by Bike
story.description:
Whether you're planning a weekend getaway or a long-distance adventure, our bike caravan goes wherever you go.
Easy to tow and quick to set up, it offers a reliable, comfortable shelter at every stop.

Focus on what matters: pedal freely and live the adventure close to nature.

history.title: A project close to our hearts
history.description: After revolutionising car travel with our Teardrops, we launched the bike camper in spring 2025 to bring the same freedom to cycle-tourists. After several prototypes and field tests, we designed a light, robust and ergonomic mini-caravan suited to long distances.
history.mission: Make cycle touring more accessible and comfortable than ever, without compromising on simplicity and the joy of travel.

1.title: Freedom
1.description: Ready in seconds - hitch it up and ride, no setup or unfolding beds.

2.title: Comfort
2.description: A real bed, smart storage, and protection from the elements.

3.title: Safety
3.description: Lockable door keeps you and your belongings safe, wherever you are.

4.title: Lightweight
4.description: So easy to tow – even with a non-electric bike.

5.title: Self-sufficient
5.description: Designed for long-distance cycling and true roaming freedom.

premium.name: Premium

faq.otherQuestions: Have more questions? Don’t hesitate to contact us – we’ll be happy to help!

teardrop.question1: Do I need a special license to tow a Teardrop?
teardrop.answer1: No additional license is required to tow a Teardrop with a gross vehicle weight (GVW) between 500 and 750 kg. Just make sure the combined GVW of the trailer and your car does not exceed 3,500 kg — otherwise, you’ll need a B96 endorsement.
teardrop.question2: Can a Teardrop be towed by any vehicle?
teardrop.answer2: Thanks to its light weight, the Teardrop can be towed by most cars. To be sure, check your car’s technical specifications or your registration certificate: subtract line F2 from F3 — the result should be 500 kg or more.
teardrop.answer3: Yes, our caravans come with a 2-year warranty. We also offer personalized support for any repairs, upgrades, or technical questions after purchase.
teardrop.answer4: Absolutely! We’d be delighted to welcome you. Just book a visit using our contact form.
teardrop.answer5: On average, it takes about two months to build your Teardrop, though this may vary depending on current orders.
teardrop.question6: Are Teardrops suitable for all seasons?
teardrop.answer6: Yes — our Teardrops are built for comfort year-round. While the outdoor kitchen is best enjoyed in good weather, the insulated cabin ensures cozy nights in any season.
teardrop.question7: Is it possible to try a teardrop before buying?
teardrop.answer7: Yes, we offer visits and test drives at our workshop in Montpellier. Contact us to arrange an appointment!

bike-camper.question1: Can I attach the caravan to any bike?
bike-camper.answer1: Most of the time, yes! If your bike has a special frame or features, we can create a custom hitch. Don’t hesitate to contact us.
bike-camper.question2: Can it be delivered to me?
bike-camper.answer2: Yes, delivery is available. Just get in touch with us to check the options for your location.
bike-camper.question3: Where am I allowed to sleep with it?
bike-camper.answer3: You can use the caravan wherever wild camping is permitted. Always check local regulations – in many places, one-night stays in nature are allowed as long as you respect the environment.
bike-camper.answer4: Absolutely! All our caravans come with a 2-year warranty, and we’re here to help if you need support or repairs.
bike-camper.question5: How long does it take to build?
bike-camper.answer5: Lead times vary depending on the season and customization level. On average, allow 2 to 6 weeks. Contact us for a more precise estimate.
bike-camper.question6: Can I use the caravan with a non-electric bike?
bike-camper.answer6: Yes! It’s light enough to tow with a regular bike. For hilly terrain or longer trips, an electric bike can add extra comfort.
bike-camper.question7: Are the caravans suitable for all seasons?
bike-camper.answer7: Yes – they offer great protection in the cold. For extreme weather, just bring the right gear (like a good sleeping bag or warm duvet). In summer, the design ensures good airflow to keep things cool.
